class.name: static_visitor
class.purpose: Convenient base type for static visitors. 用作静态访问者的基类。

description.simpara: Denotes the intent of the deriving class as meeting the requirements of a static visitor of some type. Also exposes the inner type result_type as required by the StaticVisitor concept. 表明其派生类的意图是符合作为某个类型的静态访问者的要求。 并按照 StaticVisitor 概念的要求提供内嵌类型 result_type.
Notes 备注: static_visitor is intended for use as a base type only and is therefore noninstantiable. static_visitor 的唯一目的就是用作基类，所以是不可实例化的。

typedef.name: result_type
typedef.purpose: Exposes result_type member as required by StaticVisitor concept. 按 StaticVisitor 概念的要求给出 result_type 成员。
